channel.title: Battle-Ages Project
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i50.tinypic.com/vhdoah.png[/img] [/center]Requesting team for Battle-Ages. Please use the following [URL=http://"http://forum.battle-ages.net/showthread.php?p=14"]application[/URL]. Just post it here or their, or send me a message.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/CMl9z.png[/img] [QUOTE]Battle-Ages has been around since 2006. A few months ago I started the original [COLOR="Lime"]Battle-Ages[/COLOR].However shortly after my computer crashed and it would not work. Coincidentally when that happened I had a series of personal events that occurred which did not quite let me repair my computer. Finally, after some time my computer was repaired. Unfortunately, I lost everything that was on it. So here I am, officially starting up [COLOR="lime"]Battle-Ages[/COLOR] again!. Hope you enjoy what you see!
When will the server be officially released? Soon. :p[/QUOTE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pBrqN.png[/img]
[CENTER][IMG]http://gyazo.com/972fe9cf668757a67a296a1bc2c3f0a8.png[/img] [/CENTER] [QUOTE] [CENTER]>Perfect combat system >Functional Minigames >Random Events >Every Skill >Unique PvNPC >Stable Base >Full Clipped Pathfinding (Players and Npcs) >Clipped NPCs >Clipped Players + Combat >Clipped Projectiles >Range & Mage Following >Re-Written Combat Formulas >Proper Normal Prayer >Fully Functional Vengeance >Normal + Ancient Spell Book Compete >Fast Switching >PvP Point System >4 Second Timer When You Step Out of PvP >Very Good Base For Castle Wars >Chaos Elemental >Kalphite Queen >King Black Dragon >Tzhaar Cave >Some Doors + Ladders Working (Can Easily Add More) >Good Skilling >Fully Functional Clan Chat >Excellent Economy >All Known Dupes Fixed (If You Find Another Let Me Know) >Duel Arena Dupes Fixed >MINA Framework[/CENTER] [/QUOTE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2OQKm.png[/img] [QUOTE][CENTER][URL=http://"http://forum.battle-ages.net/member.php?u=1"]Excel [/URL]- Server/Client Developer[/CENTER] [/QUOTE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2CwHx.png[/img]

[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/magic.gif[/img] [COLOR="white"]Magic [/COLOR]- 60% [COLOR="lime"]√[/COLOR] Modern Spellbook Combat Spells [COLOR="lime"]√[/COLOR] Modern Spellbook Teleports [COLOR="lime"]√[/COLOR] Ancient Spellbook Combat Spells [COLOR="lime"]√[/COLOR] Ancient Spellbook Teleports [COLOR="lime"]√[/COLOR] Modern Spellbook Non-combat Spells [COLOR="lime"]√[/COLOR] Lunar Spellbook Teleports [COLOR="Lime"]√[/COLOR] Lunar Spellbook Non-combat Spells
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/ranged.gif[/img] [COLOR="white"]Ranged [/COLOR]- 80% [COLOR="lime"]√[/COLOR] Bows and Arrows [COLOR="lime"]√ [/COLOR]Throwing Weapons [COLOR="lime"]√ [/COLOR]Crossbows and Bolts [COLOR="Lime"]√ [/COLOR]Ava's Attractor/Accumulator [COLOR="Red"]X [/COLOR]Enchanted Bolts
[IMG]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/assets/images/icons/skills/25x25/prayer.gif[/img] [COLOR="white"]Prayer [/COLOR]- 60% [COLOR="lime"]√[/COLOR] All Bones Can Be Buried [COLOR="lime"]√[/COLOR] Protect Item Prayer [COLOR="lime"]√[/COLOR] Protection Prayers [COLOR="lime"]√[/COLOR] Smite [COLOR="Red"]X[/COLOR] All Stat Boosting Prayers [COLOR="red"]X[/COLOR] Stat Restoring Prayers [COLOR="red"]X[/COLOR] Death Based Prayers

item.title: Battle-Ages Project
item.dc:creator: @battleages battleages
item.description:
@battleages wrote:

[center]
[/center]Requesting team for Battle-Ages. Please use the following application. Just post it here or their, or send me a message.

[QUOTE]Battle-Ages has been around since 2006. A few months ago I started the original [COLOR=“Lime”]Battle-Ages[/COLOR].However shortly after my computer crashed and it would not work. Coincidentally when that happened I had a series of personal events that occurred which did not quite let me repair my computer. Finally, after some time my computer was repaired. Unfortunately, I lost everything that was on it. So here I am, officially starting up [COLOR=“lime”]Battle-Ages[/COLOR] again!. Hope you enjoy what you see!

When will the server be officially released?
Soon. :p[/QUOTE]

[CENTER]

972fe9cf668757a67a296a1bc2c3f0a8.png755×495

[/CENTER]

[CENTER]>Perfect combat system

Functional Minigames
Random Events
Every Skill
Unique PvNPC
Stable Base
Full Clipped Pathfinding (Players and Npcs)
Clipped NPCs
Clipped Players + Combat
Clipped Projectiles
Range & Mage Following
Re-Written Combat Formulas
Proper Normal Prayer
Fully Functional Vengeance
Normal + Ancient Spell Book Compete
Fast Switching
PvP Point System
4 Second Timer When You Step Out of PvP
Very Good Base For Castle Wars
Chaos Elemental
Kalphite Queen
King Black Dragon
Tzhaar Cave
Some Doors + Ladders Working (Can Easily Add More)
Good Skilling
Fully Functional Clan Chat
Excellent Economy
All Known Dupes Fixed (If You Find Another Let Me Know)
Duel Arena Dupes Fixed
MINA Framework[/CENTER] [/QUOTE]

[QUOTE][CENTER]Excel - Server/Client Developer[/CENTER]

[QUOTE] [COLOR=“White”]Combat [/COLOR]- 100%
[COLOR=“Lime”]√[/COLOR] Correct Item Requirements
[COLOR=“lime”]√[/COLOR] Correct Slots
